::Aerotaur::
       He scans the area and finds Nightlight and Starstomp waiting near by.  
He swoops down and transforms to robot mode near the ground.  He smiles at 
Nightlight.  "Should we head on ?"

--part1_12f.451f4dc.28cac875_boundary
